Article.Title: New GAME_MASTER and Community Day Box

Text.p:
With the upcoming Community Day Event, if you evolve a Pupitar into a Tyranitar, it will have the Fast Move "Smack Down".
Unfortunately, the move was just nerfed. (Made slightly less effective overall.)
Move Sets have been updated to reflect this.
There is a special Community Day Box, so the Shopping Box Values tool has been updated.

Sorry that I'm a little behind on this, but I was on vacation with little to no service.
But I'm back now, so here goes...

On 7 June 2018, the Water Festival Event started.
(See https://pokemongolive.com/en/post/waterfestival2018/)

ul.li: The Raid Bosses had a bunch of changes.

Shellder, Cloyster and Kyogre are now available as shiny!
Charts have been updated.

Temporarily all new eggs are 2K and hatch a selection Water types.
Charts have been updated. (Temporarily 😉)
